response.original_title: How Mampy Very Nearly Ruined Christmas
response.overview: On Christmas Eve while putting the final touches on the Christmas tree an accident sets Mampy off on the adventure of a lifetime! Look out for Krampus, elf soldiers, evil snowmen, nutcrackers, and Rudolph himself in this offbeat , sometimes wholesome comedy from Michael Hampton.
response.title: How Mampy Very Nearly Ruined Christmas
